headline: WordPress London Meetup January 2013
keywords: Cloudflare Meetups, WordPress, Always Online, Rocket Loader, Product News, Speed & Reliability, United Kingdom, Community
description: Last night I gave a short presentation about how to use CloudFlare with WordPress sites to about 60 people attending the WordPress London Meetup. CloudFlare was happy to be sponsor of the event providing drinks, beers and lots and lots of pizza. The meetup was held at the Google Campus.
